name: SQL Injection
description: Poisoning databases with malicious queries.

name: Cross-site Scripting
description: Injecting code, where your web app is lacking.

name: Distributed Denial of Service
description: Overloading your servers with pings, until they give up the ghost.

name: Social Engineering
description: Tricking people into revealing secrets, one human at a time.

name: Man-in-the-Middle
description: Intercepting communications, as you surf through the net.

name: Backdoor
description: Slipping through a secret entrance, into a fortified system.

name: Buffer Overflow
description: Flooding memory with bytes, until it bursts at the seams.

name: Keylogger
description: Stealthily recording your every keystroke, as you type away in blissful ignorance.

name: Phishing
description: Luring the unsuspecting to a trap, with a cleverly disguised bait.

name: Network Mapping
description: Probing the network for vulnerabilities, with eyes unblinking.

name: DNS Spoofing
description: Poisoning the cache with fraudulent entries, to direct traffic your way.

name: Trojan Horse
description: Smuggling in a deadly package, hidden in plain sight.

name: Rootkit
description: Concealing its presence, while it hijacks control of the system.

name: Session Hijacking
description: Taking over an authenticated session, to wreak havoc in plain view.

name: Worm
description: Replicating like a virus, spreading destruction far and wide.

name: Logic Bomb
description: Waiting silently, until the perfect moment to strike.

name: Ransomware
description: Holding your data hostage, for a king's ransom in bitcoin.

name: Zero-day Exploit
description: Taking advantage of unpatched software, before anyone knows the flaw.

name: Brute Force
description: Battering down the door with sheer strength, and the will to succeed.

name: SQL Sniffing
description: Eavesdropping on the database, to steal its secrets.

name: Password Attack
description: Guessing every combination, until the gates unlock.

name: Exploit Kits
description: Bundling attacks, to unleash them in a devastating barrage.

name: Fileless Malware
description: Striking like a ninja, leaving no trace of its deadly presence.

name: Honeypot
description: Tempting attackers into a trap, with a delectable prize.

name: Remote Access Trojan
description: Sneaking into the system, from the comfort of your own lair.

name: Ad Fraud
description: Pocketing profits from phony clicks, with digital sleight of hand.

name: Macro Virus
description: Infecting the most unsuspecting of places, with the power of automation.

name: Packet Sniffing
description: Capturing network traffic, to reveal its hidden secrets.

name: Advanced Persistent Threat
description: Slowly and methodically, stalking its prey in the shadows.

name: Cross-Site Request Forgery
description: Faking the source of a web request, to cause chaos behind the scenes.

name: Firewall
description: The digital fortress that keeps out intruders

name: Anti-virus Software
description: The vigilant protector against malware and viruses

name: Intrusion Detection System
description: The watchful sentinel on the lookout for unwanted guests

name: Security Information and Event Management
description: The analyzer and collector of digital data to keep you safe

name: Virtual Private Network
description: The secret tunnel through which your digital footprints can safely travel

name: Patch Management
description: The gatekeeper that ensures your digital armor is never vulnerable

name: Access Control
description: The guard that protects the castle by controlling who enters and who leaves

name: Data Backup and Recovery
description: The safety net that keeps your digital valuables from being lost forever

name: Encryption
description: The secret code that only those with the key can decipher

name: Network Segmentation
description: The digital walls that keep different parts of your castle separate

name: Two-Factor Authentication
description: The gatekeeper that requires two keys to open the door

name: Security Awareness Training
description: The digital sensei that teaches you how to protect yourself

name: Incident Response Plan
description: The digital fire department that puts out the flames and minimizes the damage

name: Web Application Firewall
description: The protector of your digital storefront, ensuring only the good guys get in

name: Network Monitoring
description: The digital neighborhood watch that keeps an eye out for suspicious activity

name: Ad Blocker
description: A digital bouncer keeping unwanted guests out of your online party.

name: Cryptojacking
description: A surreptitious robbery in the night, stealing your computer's might.

name: Deception Technology
description: A smoke and mirrors show, fooling foes as you go.

name: IoT Security
description: A watchful eye over all, keeping safe the things we install.

name: Threat Intelligence
description: A sniffer dog in the digital realm, catching the bad guys at the helm.
